Server.Name: Great White North Server
Server.Description:
All the mods needed to play on the Great White North server
Special thanks to the following people for making these awesome mods! If I leave anyone out by accident, let me know.
Discord: Discord: https://discord.gg/zpvGNTu
Ana - vehicle respawner Epic Spire - mod slot boost Khaine - 3 Slot forge - 12 slot crafting queue - 96 slot backpack - log spikes - HP Bars XythCommunityProject - For the animal, humane, and mech creature packs Bdubs - for the awesome vehicles mod Dough - Rabbit of Caerbannog DragonSoldierGJ - Food and drink recipe mod Stample - Dr. Prepper drink - Frobscottle - Mutations mod (skill point) - Naked Gator Xyth - Fun with flags - Radios (placable in game) - Zombie pinups Gouki - GK storage Gyancher - Working ice machine - Coffee Ragsy2145 - Hang glider Jax Teller - Charcoal - Iron Ore - Less forest deco - Trash destroys on loot - Working microwave Karoti - Junction box for invisible wire Khelldon - Baby bears (so cute) Kodiak420 - Lootable zombies Erik3227 - Lootable medbox found in the wild Noblegases - Noble's Food plus PhDGaming - PhD better 30K stacks 1.4 Russian Dood - grass cutter stedman420 - SimpleUI compass skullman678 - Skull lights (multi colour) Ã‰ric Beaudon - Spartan Blocks Stallion's Den - Everything is sellable - Extra recipes - Lootable Objects - Mining machine and raid catcher - No armor encumberance - Weapons - I had to mod the mining machine to just give items like resource... People were complaining/having issues with the ore being looted Xyth/Drconfused/Rewtrg - Steel bars Tallon - Generic ammo set mod Telric - Horses and Spiders HN - Unnecessary but Beautiful (using the 18.3 version, but it seems to work) Valmar - Animal snars - Auto walls - Buffed supply crates - Disable falling trees - Expanded player storage - Expanded traps - Starter class system - Working ovens and sinks - Zombie pinups
I seriously can't thank you all enough. You have inspired me to make my own mods, start a server 4 years ago, etc. Keep up the great work!!
